text: @kenolin1 @Sammastyle Heard a lady in waiting for her coronavirus infection say she thinks it’s no different than the flu and she said she wouldn’t be wearing a mask. When asked abt. signing the waiver she said, she signs waivers all the time and this is no different(on2say)he isn’t responsible
